about_the_game:
An artbook detailing notes on character designs; backgrounds; and extra content such as scrapped characters; and original notes for certain scenes for P R I S M - A Visual Novel. Said artbook has 40+ pages worth of content to read through and enjoy.

(Please note: This artbook treats the reader as someone who has seen all the endings for the game itself and so will contain spoilers for P R I S M - A Visual Novel.)
